Back: tori rotates back to uke offset at the hip 70/30; far ankle blocks uke's far ankle; tori lowers as pulling uke over leg; tori raises to pop uke over leg.

Front: Counter Osoto Gari with Osoto Gaeshi
Counter O Goshi with outside leg jump around to De Ashi Barai

Back: from side; pull uke out to make space; step over and around neck; knee and foot touch; whale forward; triangle lock; hook leg with arm.

from top; pull uke out to make space; knee against neck; other foot around waste; knee and foot touch; grab belt and knee side elbow; pull uke back over head and onto back; pull arm under face; triangle neck and pinch thighs to choke.

Front: Turtle - Double hand belt pull drill
Turtle - Slap; pass; and roll into Ushiro Kesa Gatame
Half guard - Uke grabs own belt
Half guard - Uke grabs tori over shoulder
Half guard - Uke grabs tori around torso
Combo Ko Uchi into Uchi Mata
Combo Ko Soto into Tai Otoshi
Seoi Nage bogyo into drop seoi
Back: Uke bogyo's seoi; tori drops to knees between legs and pulls uke over sholder while rolling into kesa.

Front: Seoi Nage blocked into kouchi makikomi
Back: Uke pushes back to block seoi; tori crab walks toward uke and hooks leg to make uke fall back (kouchi makikomi).
